publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment.

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Shona Robison*
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Christine Grahame*

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-446 Precious Life (lodged on 20 January 2000) Robert Brown*

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life-That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Robert Brown

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Robert Brown

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Robert Brown

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Robert Brown

S1M-446 Tommy Sheridan: Precious Life—That the Parliament condemns the intimidating and undemocratic activities of the anti-abortion campaign, Precious Life; and defends the right of women in Scotland to attend family planning clinics and pregnancy advice centres free from harassment. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Robert Brown
